column4: hello guys. BitchX anyone? how to read private msg or the people who msg to me? i cannot read their msg using ctrl+n or ctrl+p and /win 1 or /win # ....
you are aware that BitchX was removed from debian long ago because it is no longer maintained and contains known security vulnerabilities, right?
interesting, there is a BitchX2 according to http://www.bitchx.com/
gogeta : ah so chance to read the msgs for the last time?just for this day?i will close the BitchX after i read the msgs.its like 24 windows there... how to read the private msg in BitchX?
